created_by: Michael Haag, Mark Woan (improvements), James Pemberton / @4A616D6573 / oscd.community (improvements)
name: Net.exe Execution
description: Detects execution of Net.exe, whether suspicious or benign.
false_positives: Will need to be tuned. If using Splunk, I recommend | stats count by Computer,CommandLine following the search for easy hunting by computer/CommandLine.
query: ((process.executable:(/.*\\[Nn][Ee][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Nn][Ee][Tt]1\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR process.pe.original_file_name:(/[Nn][Ee][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Nn][Ee][Tt]1\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) AND process.command_line:(/.*\ [Gg][Rr][Oo][Uu][Pp].*/ OR /.*\ [Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll][Gg][Rr][Oo][Uu][Pp].*/ OR /.*\ [Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr].*/ OR /.*\ [Vv][Ii][Ee][Ww].*/ OR /.*\ [Ss][Hh][Aa][Rr][Ee].*/ OR /.*\ [Aa][Cc][Cc][Oo][Uu][Nn][Tt][Ss].*/ OR /.*\ [Ss][Tt][Oo][Pp]\ .*/ OR /.*\ [Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:(*\\net.exe OR *\\net1.exe) OR process.pe.original_file_name:(net.exe OR net1.exe)) AND process.command_line:(*\ group* OR *\ localgroup* OR *\ user* OR *\ view* OR *\ share* OR *\ accounts* OR *\ stop\ * OR *\ start*))`
